numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph displays racial disparity in different major sports leagues.
2. The graph shows the percent of players of color.
3. The graph shows the percent of coaches of color.
4. The womens NBA has the highest percentage of players of color.
5. The percentage of players of color in the womens NBA is 83%.
6. The mens NBA has the highest percentage of players of color.
7. The percentage of players of color in the mens NBA is 83%.
8. The MLB has the smallest percentage of players of color.
9. The percentage of players of color in the MLB is 40%.
10. I wonder why the graph incorporates only one womens sport association.
11. I wonder what the graphs looked like in previous years.
12. I wonder how much the graphs have changed throughout the years.
14. Seeing this data gives us a better understanding of the diversity of sports across the US.
15. The data implies that people of color are not represented enough in the coaching community.
16. The data implies that people of color may not be given as many coaching opportunities.
